alert.note: Alert for Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Indian River, south central Brevard and southeastern Osceola Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Kenansville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Indian River, south central Brevard and southeastern Osceola Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Osceola
